name: International Yehudi Menuhin Foundation
membership:
Membre du réseau belge de la Fondation Anna Lindh
Membre de la plateforme Intercultural Europe
goal: The mission of the International Yehudi Menuhin Foundation is to remind the political, cultural and educational institutions of the central role of art and creativity in any personal and societal process.  Based in Brussels and operating as an international association under Belgian law, the foundation’s mission is to develop sustainable projects and partnerships that can bring European added value by fostering intercultural dialogue and social integration of vulnerable groups through the practice of art as a source of self-development and well-being.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, External Relations, Youth
euInitiatives:
Project leader for projects submitted to DGEAC Culture
DGEAC LLP: Erasmus+ Programme
